title: Guitars
subtitle: One of the most iconic stringed instrument!
description: Broad variety of guitars and bass guitars  to choose from.
These include instruments such as acoustic guitars and basses and
electric guitars with a number of strings varying from 4 to 9.
The latter category can be divided in stratocaser models, telecaster models,
single cut and double cut models, jazz or hollowbody guitars, hard and heavy guitars
and many more.

title: Guitar and Basses Amplifiers
subtitle: What would guitars be without these power boxed?
description: These small or huge bad boys are the most valuable friend of any guitarist.
They allow you to shape your guitar sound and as the name suggest, it amplifies
the sound of your instrument. Different amplifiers allow different sound
configuration, tones and sometimes effects. Absolutely amazing if you ask!

title: Drums and Percussion
subtitle: Most important instrument in any song
description: Today a song is all about the rhythm and what instrument is better
at creating a rhythm other than the good, old drum. There is nothing much
to say about these, I mean, c'mon, everybody know what a drum does. Just take
a seat and unleash powerfull heavy metal drum blasts or a slow and steady groove.

title: Keyboards and Synth
subtitle: Anything else to say? Everybody knows about them!
description: Keyboards instruments are one of the most popular musical instruments among the
beginners and experienced musicians alike. Whether you want to keep it classic
or have a more modern aproach these instruments won't fail you. Now give it a try!

title: Endless possibilities
subtitle: Choosing an instrument for you can be a neverending journey.
description: The world of musical instruments is very vast and it is in a continuous
expansion. Remember that if you are still unsure what instrument you want
to befriend with, we are always there to guide and help you because we know
that music is very important for most people today! We encourage everyone to
give it a try.
